room_title: Escape room "Return To Planet Earth Junior" by Code Breakers in Pittsburgh
review: We have done both Return to Planet Earth and the Cloning Experiment activities (kids 7-12 level). Grown ups and children enjoyed finding the clues, working in teams and scratching their heads when tasks were challenging. You can always ask for help. The game is hard enough that kids feel encouraged finding the answers but not so difficult that is frustrating. Bob was very helpful with the introduction to the room and taking pictures of our clones. Highly recommended!

room_title: Escape room "Return To Planet Earth Junior" by Code Breakers in Pittsburgh
review: We took my 7 year old daughter here with friends(7 to 9 year olds) for her birthday and they had a blast! They loved trying to solve the clues and had to work as a team... staff was great and it was a wonderful adventure for the kids!

room_title: Escape room "Return To Planet Earth Junior" by Code Breakers in Pittsburgh
review: We did the kids challenge - lots of fun. The challenges are very clever and challenging for the kids (and even the adults). Highly recommended.
